name: cosmic cal
notes:
cosmic cal (crochet a-long) is sponsored by stylecraft yarns, and designed by me, helen shrimpton.

the cal starts in april, but you can find all the information in the [introducing cosmic cal post][1].

there will be nine [9] parts in total.
each part will be a photo tutorial, but there are also full video tutorials to help you, again the links will be posted in each blog post which you will find on my website, along with lots of hints and tips.
[cosmic cal][2]

you can find the downloadable pdf parts on the stylecraft website for

[us terms][3]
[uk terms][4]
[dutch][5]

[all other translations will be on my website][6]
[part 1][7]
[part 2][8]
